value:
$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Oh, hello! Are you by any chance
the Divine Dragon Naga?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロナーガ,ch04_33_Naga_F_Halloween22,Face|I know nothing of this Naga of whom
you speak.$k$pYou may address me as the queen of
ghosts, for that is how others choose
to perceive me this evening.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Right, so you're...not a dragon, then?
Looks like we're not going to get
what we came for here, Nils.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Yeah, I guess not. I'm as confused
as you are...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロナーガ,ch04_33_Naga_F_Halloween22,Face|If you do not wish to trick-or-treat,
then this candy belongs to me.
I bid you farewell.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|There she goes...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|The Divine Dragon is really getting
into the spirit of the harvest festival,
isn't she?$k$pMaybe I could stand to learn a thing
or two from her example...$k$p$Sbs150|
